name: Gold Rush (Bouncing Turtle, bennissimov)
description:
An evil wizard has placed a terrible curse on the world and its going to end in one minute. Luckily you have the power to control time, fast forward, rewind and freeze time as you work with your friends to find what you need to defeat the evil wizard.

20 NPC's most of which have unique and helpful dialog. A main quest line and a side questline for a little bonus. A short puzzle game that should last 5 to 20 minutes.
